title: Beautiful 5 BD/4.5 BA House with Garden in Eureka Valley
posting_body: 3816 21st Street – Beautiful Five Bedroom Home
Note – No virtual showings.
Anyone interested must be physically present for an in-person viewing.
Vacant and available for rent within the next 30 days
DESCRIPTION:
Beautiful 5 bedroom 4.5 bath, 4-level Victorian home

Entry level features spacious formal living and dining room with decorative fireplace and bay window, double parlor doors, wainscoting, elegant built in shelving, and chandeliers throughout with classic period details.
A spacious deck off living room offers stunning, sweeping view of Eureka Valley and downtown.
The kitchen and half bath complete this level of the home.
Bright, light-filled kitchen features marble counters, center island, dishwasher, microwave, large 5-burner gas stove and oven, two sinks, and refrigerator
Upstairs level of home features 3 spacious bedrooms with great views and 2 bathrooms – one with shower over tub and one with walk in shower and large vanities.
Master bedroom has attached bathroom and 2 large closets
Down a level is a spacious bedroom, bathroom with dual vanity, large bathtub, and washer & dryer.
This level has entrance to parking garage which can fit two cars tandem style
The garden level offers a flexible bedroom which could be used as a media room and also has an attached remodeled full bath.
Lovely garden with lush foliage with direct access from this room
LOCATION:
Located on a quaint block in great location in Eureka Valley in close proximity to several wonderful neighborhoods including Dolores Heights, Noe Valley, The Castro, and Inner Mission.
Ten minute walk to beautiful Dolores Park!
Ten minute walk to Whole Foods on 24th Street and many great restaurants, cafes, and retails stores
Close proximity to multiple Muni lines and 16th and 24 street Bart Stations
OTHER DETAILS:
No smoking
Tenant responsible for all utilities
Pets considered on a case by case basis (2 cats max, 1 small-medium size dog)
Minimum lease term is 12 months
Deposit is 1.5x monthly rent
For more information
